channel.title: Stupid Time Warner Cable!
channel.description:
Friday about 4pm or so I noticed a Time Warner (my ISP) truck out in front of my house. I figured they must have been working on a neighbor's line because they had just transfered my service to my new house from my old one 6 days before. Turns out they were disconnecting me over a past due bill I didn't owe from 2007. We canceled service and time warner came out and picked up the modem November 7th, 2007, but time warner continued to bill me for service in november, december and january, and then charged me for not returning the modem. I talked to thousands of people on the phone, none of which could help me. Even went to the store where they said they couldn't help me. Long story short I am getting a different provider tomorrow morning hopefully, so then I will be back.
Moral of the story, don't go with time warner. :mad:

item.title: Stupid Time Warner Cable!
item.dc:creator: @440SixPak 440SixPak
item.description:
@440SixPak wrote:

Nice to see that Time Warner are still a bunch of useless cunts. I ended up going from them (after the EXACT same bs they pulled with you), to Comcrap, and now to Verizon. If they don’t work out I’m pretty much fubar

Read full topic

item.title: Stupid Time Warner Cable!
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

My ISP is pretty bad too. When we moved house, it took over a week for them to come out and when they finally did, the guy was like “I am in a retarded mood today, so for the lols I am going to get the guys in the ISP to limit your connection to 1mbps.” Then he did it and left. But since my router is old and glitchy (in a good way) my speed jumped back to 10-15mbps after like a week.

Read full topic

item.title: Stupid Time Warner Cable!
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Tico135, post:13, topic:255865”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=338056.msg2624391#msg2624391 date=1231692359]
Wolf Creek was the worst movie ever.

Oh, and my internet is back, hopefully for good. I still hate Time Warner Cable though.
[/quote]

That was quick. Did you threaten them with those guns of yours? ;)[/quote]

I thought I was going to have to, but I went with a different company.

Read full topic

item.title: Stupid Time Warner Cable!
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

Small ISP companies provide much higher quality customer service in my opinion.
I was on the phone with Bell Canada for over 3 hours, on hold, until I just gave up and stopped paying bills. When I switched to Yaknet, I could get in touch with someone who wasn’t located in India within 10 minutes.

Read full topic
